resources.string: Value can be a color name (e.g. blue) or a hex color (e.g. #0000ff, or #550000ff for alpha transparency)

"For the timeline leading up to the release of Cannon on Android, touch the \'History\' button.
Whether you like Cannon or not, please rate and comment on it to compliment my work and/or let me know where it needs to improve.
As with everything I do, I am open to suggestions, bug reports, questions, comments, etc."
